info.title: FirstPromoter Admin Payouts API
info.description: API documentation for admin payouts endpoints

get.description:
With this endpoint you can list all payouts. **HTTP Request**
`GET https://api.firstpromoter.com/api/v2/company/payouts`

parameters.name: ids[]
parameters.description: Array of payout ids to get

parameters.name: filters[campaign_id]
parameters.description: Campaign ids. Can be Integer or Array of Integers

parameters.name: filters[payments_batch_id]
parameters.description: Payment batches ids. Can be Integer or Array of Integers

parameters.name: filters[fraud_suspicions]
parameters.description: Fraud suspicions. Multiple values can be passed as an array. Send ['no_suspicion'] to filter promoters with no fraud suspicions

get.description:
This endpoint returns statistics about payouts. **HTTP Request**
`GET https://api.firstpromoter.com/api/v2/company/payouts/stats`

parameters.name: stats_by[paid_period]
parameters.description: Shows the stats by payout period only for paid payouts

parameters.name: stats_by[status]
parameters.description: Shows the stats by status (pending, failed, processing, completed)

parameters.name: stats_by[payout_method]
parameters.description: Shows the stats by payout method

parameters.name: filters[campaign_id]
parameters.description: Campaign ids. Can be Integer or Array of Integers

get.description:
This endpoint returns statistics about due payouts. **HTTP Request**
`GET https://api.firstpromoter.com/api/v2/company/payouts/due_stats`

parameters.name: filters[campaign_id]
parameters.description: Campaign ids. Can be Integer or Array of Integers

get.summary: Get all payouts grouped by promoters
get.description:
This endpoint returns all payouts but grouped by promoters. **HTTP Request**
`GET https://api.firstpromoter.com/api/v2/company/payouts/group_by_promoters`

parameters.name: filters[campaign_id]
parameters.description: Campaign ids. Can be Integer or Array of Integers

parameters.name: include_payout_method_details
parameters.description: Set it true to include the payout_method_details

parameters.name: filters[min_payment]
parameters.description: Filters payouts by the minimum payment amount possible

post.description:
This endpoint creates a new payments batch. **HTTP Request**
`POST https://api.firstpromoter.com/api/v2/company/payouts/create_payments_batch`

Marks selected payouts as paid **HTTP Request**
`POST https://api.firstpromoter.com/api/v2/company/payouts/mark_as_paid`

Marks selected payouts as unpaid **HTTP Request**
`POST https://api.firstpromoter.com/api/v2/company/payouts/mark_as_unpaid`

AccountId.name: Account-ID
AccountId.description: Account identifier that specifies which account is making the request

tax_rate.description: Tax rate applied to the payout

paid_at.description: Date when the payout was paid

processing_started_at.description: Date when the payout processing started

error.description: Error message if the payout failed

created_at.description: Date when the payout was created

date_added.description: Date when the payout method was added

is_disabled.description: Whether the payout method is disabled

is_selected.description: Whether the payout method is selected

managed_payouts.description: Whether payouts are managed by us (auto-payouts)

net_payout_days.description: Number of days for net payout

managed_payouts.description: Whether payouts are managed by us (auto-payouts)

net_payout_days.description: Number of days for net payout

managed_payouts.description: Whether payouts are managed by us (auto-payouts)

due_date.description: Due date for the next payout

date_added.description: Date when the payout method was added

is_disabled.description: Whether the payout method is disabled

is_selected.description: Whether the payout method is selected

managed_payouts.description: Whether payouts are managed by us (auto-payouts)

is_retriable.description: Whether the batch can be retried

is_payment_otp_required.description: Whether OTP is required for payment

error.description: Error message if the batch failed

updated_at.description: When the action was last updated

BearerAuth.description: Access token passed as a Bearer token in the Authorization header

accountId.name: ACCOUNT-ID
accountId.description: Account ID required with bearer token
